channel.title: My Dream
channel.description:
Hello, I'm Ancient Weed and I had This Dream For atleast one year it was making my Runescape. I know wat your saying "OMFG WRONG FOURMS!!! NOOB!!!" but no Im Talking about my own Runescape. " but insted of "runescape.com" mine would be "v3scape.com" or somthing but you know I do [u]NOT[/u] "want to create my own server i want to create my own runescape so please help. tell some info is copyright? is do-able?. So thank for your time. Oh if your asking WHY? the hell would you wanna create your own runescape? because i got perm-ban for saying "lmao!!! u die-ed noob lololol u 1-iteming noob you cant FIGHT!!" <-- to a mod
thank you
[glow=red,2,300]Ancient[glow=green,2,300][/glow]Weed[/glow]

item.title: My Dream
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Uriko:

Guys, he wants to make a different game, NOT using runescape graphics, etc… BUT… why are you telling this? If you want to make a game in java, LEARN java first.

He said he wanted to create his own runescape.

Ancient weed:

ok thany you URIKO your the only one that help

Apparently he’s the only one that can understand noobspeak.

Read full topic
